Algebraic.description: Implement an iterative function that calculates the factorial of the number
Develop a function that uses Gauss's formula to calculate the sum of natural numbers up to the given number
Implement an efficient primality test (such as checking divisibility up to the square root) to determine if the number is prime

Sorting.description: Implement the Heap Sort algorithm to sort the following list of numbers in ascending order
Apply the Merge Sort algorithm to sort the following list of hashed file sizes (integers) in descending order
Use the Quick Sort algorithm to sort the following list of numbers in descending order

Search.description: Develop a function that uses sequential search to return the position of number 9 in the following list
Implement a linear search that returns the position of number 7 in the following list, or -1 if not found
Use binary search to find the number 5 in the following sorted list

Recursion.description: Use recursion to determine whether the following string is a palindrome
Implement a recursive function that calculates the nth term of the Fibonacci sequence for the following position
Use recursion to verify whether the following string is a valid symmetric encryption key (same forwards and backwards)
